title: About
text: I am the Statistical Project Manager for the Division of Lung Transplant in the Department of Cardiothoracic Surgery at the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center. I have a Ph.D. in Psychology from Georgia State University, and am currently completing a Master’s Degree in Statistical Data Science from Texas A&M University.
